(Icedemon...none of the Newcomers are in the Ark or Cybertronian Fire.  They 
are all at base, on Cybertron, or in the Void)



Unitron:



Unitron looked to Annhialator.  "Hmmm...Shuko won't want to get rid of his 
power.  We should place him in the bridge.  Anubis and Hades will go to the 
more powerful side.  Ours.  You grab one half of Shuko, I'll grab the other.  
We'll carry him to the brig."

Unitron walked over to Shuko, grabbing both of Shuko's calves, pulling them 
up, waiting for Annhialator to get the other end.
